title: Appendix D—Recommended Play Booster Mix for Limited Tournaments

rules.title: Recommended Play Booster Mix for Limited Tournaments
rules.content:
Appendix D—Recommended Play Booster Mix for Limited Tournaments

Note: The following play boosters mixes are required for Premier Play tournaments. For Lorwyn Eclipsed, the recommended play booster mix for Limited tournaments is (effective January 16, 2026):

• Individual Sealed Deck – 6 Lorwyn Eclipsed (per player)
• Individual Booster Draft or Team Rochester Draft – 3 Lorwyn Eclipsed (per player)
• Three-Person Team Sealed – 12 Lorwyn Eclipsed (per team)
• Two-Headed Giant Sealed Deck – 8 Lorwyn Eclipsed (per team)
• Two-Headed Giant Booster Draft – 6 Lorwyn Eclipsed (per team)

For Magic: The Gathering | Avatar: The Last Airbender, the recommended play booster mix for Limited tournaments is (effective November 14, 2025):

• Individual Sealed Deck – 6 Magic: The Gathering | Avatar: The Last Airbender (per player)
• Individual Booster Draft or Team Rochester Draft – 3 Magic: The Gathering | Avatar: The Last Airbender (per player)
• Three-Person Team Sealed – 12 Magic: The Gathering | Avatar: The Last Airbender (per team)
• Two-Headed Giant Sealed Deck – 8 Magic: The Gathering | Avatar: The Last Airbender (per team)
• Two-Headed Giant Booster Draft – 6 Magic: The Gathering | Avatar: The Last Airbender (per team)

For Magic: The Gathering | Marvel’s Spider-Man, the recommended play booster mix for Limited tournaments is
(effective September 19, 2025 to November 13, 2025):
• Individual Sealed Deck – 6 Magic: The Gathering | Marvel’s Spider-Man (per player)
• Individual Booster Draft or Team Rochester Draft – 3 Magic: The Gathering | Marvel’s Spider-Man (per player)
• Three-Person Team Sealed – 12 Magic: The Gathering | Marvel’s Spider-Man (per team)
• Two-Headed Giant Sealed Deck – 8 Magic: The Gathering | Marvel’s Spider-Man (per team)
• Two-Headed Giant Booster Draft – 6 Magic: The Gathering | Marvel’s Spider-Man (per team)

For Edge of Eternities, the recommended play booster mix for Limited tournaments is (effective July 25, 2025 through November 13, 2025):

• Individual Sealed Deck – 6 Edge of Eternities (per player)
• Individual Booster Draft or Team Rochester Draft – 3 Edge of Eternities (per player)
• Three-Person Team Sealed – 12 Edge of Eternities (per team)
• Two-Headed Giant Sealed Deck – 8 Edge of Eternities (per team)
• Two-Headed Giant Booster Draft – 6 Edge of Eternities (per team)
